character.name: Dwight Schrute
character.description: Like every great TV character, Dwight feels completely familiar and yet utterly unique: that humorless pest of a co-worker we’ve all had at one point, turned up to 11. Rainn Wilson crafted a marvel of nerd-rage intensity, making Dwight the perfect target for Jim’s juvenile pranks. Still, in his passionate love for Angela, his endless devotion to Michael and his surprising affection for Pam, Dwight proved he wasn’t such a weirdo after all.
